resources.string: This is a project created by team of students to make students life easier and healthier. Currently it is only web platform but soon it will be equipped with mobile app.

From hobby to the platform. The whole project is based on combination of food and training. Food is the main thing for providing healthier life. With this platform it is possible to track and plan your meals and training. Currently it is only available food tracking.
On this link you can found instruction on how to use the platform. If you have any questions of feedback feel free to ask us through this form.
